message: Let's make a deal quickly, Bob. Time is money, and it's losing value fast!
Time is money, Alice, but I'm not rushing into a bad deal. Let's be fair.
Bob, my offer is getting better for you. Let's close this deal before inflation eats away at your share even more.
Alice, I'm not going to let inflation dictate our deal.  I'm offering you a fair share, but I'm not giving in to pressure.
Bob, this is a generous offer considering the inflation. Don't let this opportunity slip away. It's only going to get worse for you!
Alice, we're both losing money with each passing round.  Let's end this game with a compromise that's fair to both of us.
Bob, I'm sticking to my guns on this one.  Take it or leave it, but every round that passes is costing you serious money!
